title: The additional FSI shall be granted beyond permissible FSI as per regulation 30(A)(1)upon the payment of premium
clause_text: The additional FSI shall be granted beyond permissible FSI as per regulation 30(A)(1)upon the payment of premium. Such premium shall be recovered for the BUA at the rate of 50% of ASR for open develop land (for FSI 1)
